EmailTemplate.name: Product Compliance Signature
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} Case #:{!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Thread_Id}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Best Regards productcompliance (productcompliance@te.com)
TE Connectivity
For Product Compliance Go to →www.te.com →Click on Resources at the right top and from drop down select Product Compliance. →Scroll down a bit under Solutions click on “Check Product Compliance and get Statements of Compliance (SoC)” →Enter up to 20 part numbers (1 per line) or submit a spreadsheet to search for more part numbers; →On the search result page, compliance information is available. →At the right bottom corner, you can download the SOC (Statement of Compliance) per part, along with the MD in it or download SOC in one pdf file for all searched parts.
